text:
Hi,
I'm trying to get hubdb contents using content search API (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content>)
Here is my query `?tableId=2679557&term=a`
it doesn't return any content.
Any suggestion/example how to properly compose the query? especially combination of `&hubdbQuery=` and `tableId`.
thanks!
Has anyone ever setup a HubDB update with a jotform submission -> Zapier -> HubDB or similar? Is this even possible?
Has anyone been able to pull Deal properties into a Quote? I've been able to pull the usual data (names, addresses, products, totals etc,) but I'd like to pull some custom fields that we created.
We are using the quote_simple template provided

Hi <@U01K8G871ML> -- I was informed last week from HubSpot that the new Custom Quotes beta is allowing for you to pull in deal properties. I just tried it and it didn't work. I was hoping to find some answers in the community. But if you figure it out would love to know more!
I'm stuck with that as well. It pulls some data but not everything we need. I guess we will have to wait until an update.
